original: Åkesson, Åke, stadsassessor, Göteborg, f. 9/2/13 i Malmö av dir. Aug. Å. o. Ester Olsson. G. 40 m. Anne-Marie Ericsson. Barn : Anders f. 42, Ingvar 46. — Studrex. i Gbg 31, avg:-ex. fr. Gbgs hand:inst. 32, jur. kand. i Upps. 38. Tingstjg. i Sunnervikens doms. 39-42, e. not. v. drätselkamm. i Gbg 43, not. där 44, stadsassess. fr. 46.
translated: Åkesson, Åke, city assessor, Gothenburg, b. 9/2/13 in Malmö to director August Å. and Ester Olsson. Married in 1940 to Anne-Marie Ericsson. Children: Anders b. 1942, Ingvar b. 1946. Studied at Göteborg University in 1931, graduated from Göteborg School of Business in 1932, received a law degree from Uppsala University in 1938. Worked as a court clerk in Sunnerviken district court from 1939-1942, appointed assistant clerk in Gothenburg's administrative board in 1943, became a clerk in 1944, and city assessor from 1946.
